title: Defence PRO deletes tweet on iftar hosted by Army in J&K after ‘criticism’ - The Indian Express
content: Defence PRO deletes tweet on iftar hosted by Army in J&K after ‘criticism’  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: The post by the ministry’s public relations officer in Jammu on the Army’s secular tradition had been criticised by the editor-in-chief of Sudarshan News
